Module neidische.narwale.hp
Package gui.mvvm.game

Class BoardMapCreator

java.lang.Object
gui.mvvm.game.BoardMapCreator
public class BoardMapCreator extends Object
The class BoardMapCreator creates the grid and fills it with the images of the board elements of the corresponding map
Author:
Tim Kriegelsteiner
